H0.text: British MP, Diane Abbott, learned to play which musical instrument in the tv series ‘Play It Again’. Guitar

H1.text: British MP, Diane Abbott, learned to play which musical instrument in the tv series ‘Play It Again’. Drums

H2.text: British MP, Diane Abbott, learned to play which musical instrument in the tv series ‘Play It Again’. Violin

H3.text: British MP, Diane Abbott, learned to play which musical instrument in the tv series ‘Play It Again’. Piano

A4.text: Abbott began learning the piano under the tutelage of Paul Roberts, Professor of Piano at the Guildhall School of Music and Drama, for the BBC documentary television programme Play It Again.
